name: Edwards Temper
description:
I am an absolute gentleman and I always try to be an open book. Life is full of ups and downs but I can say that I am quite successful in my career. I love having fun with my free time. I play golf regularly and I also riding my horses. I appreciate the simple things in life that most people often take for granted. I believe we should treat others the exact same way we would love to be treated. Life is too short for games!
I am searching for an honest good woman with a golden heart that I can give my all and make the Queen of my heart!
